physicalDescription.note: Typed on back of photograph: ''Resting on the lawn, National Home for Jewish Children at Denver.'' Handwritten on back of photograph:''Marianbelle Levi Playfield, 1928.''

mods.abstract: Several children resting on the lawn in the Marianbelle Levi Playfield at the National Home for Jewish Children.
